strong.span: Last Day Of School will be Friday, May 1st

br.span: Information about checking in books, computers, materials, etc. will be announced at a later time.

a.addthis:title: Free Lunches For Logan View Students: Monday - Friday (Hooper, Nickerson, & Uehling)

span.strong: Free Lunches For Logan View Students: Monday - Friday (Hooper, Nickerson, & Uehling)

div.p:
Logan View community members are partnering with Hooper’s Market on Main to provide FREE grab-and-go sack lunches for any K-12 student that finds themselves needing a meal during this break from school.
Hooper — The Clay Center (113 N Main Street)
Hooper lunches are available for pick up daily from 11am - 1pm.
Nickerson — Short Shop Gas Station (2310 HWY 91) Uehli...

a.addthis:title: Logan View Facily & Consumer Science / FCCLA Nutritious Meal Planning Suggestions

span.strong: Logan View Facily & Consumer Science / FCCLA Nutritious Meal Planning Suggestions

div.p:
Sound nutrition is important for families and for young children and adolescents. With children and families unexpectedly being at home, current nutrition demands and costs can be considerable.
Logan View Family & Consumer Science students and FCCLA students wanted to provide families with some simple suggestions for nutritional meal planning ideas with both nutrition and economics in mind. The fol...
